trans.title: In case of the front side frame replacement only; Leaving the side frame extension to the body side

item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Front Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)

s1.ptxt: Clamp the new front side frame and the front bulkhead, and measure the front compartment diagonally.
Check the body dimensions:

ptxt.sie-ref04: Engine compartment and front floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the front subframe, and check the front side frame and the front suspension positions.
Remove the clamped parts.
Tack weld the side frame gusset to the front side backplate.
Remove the front side backplate and the side frame gusset.
Weld the front side frame (A) and the side frame stiffener (B) (right side only) to the body side of the side frame extension (C).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the side frame gusset (A) to the front side backplate (B), install the side frame bulkhead (C) on left side, and weld the gusset plate (D).
Clamp the front side backplate (A) to the front side frame (B).
Left side: Weld the upper side frame plate (A) to the front side backplate (B), the front side frame (C), the side frame gusset (D), and the gusset plate (E).
Left side: Weld the bulkhead support (F), the front side frame, and the front side bulkhead (G).
Weld the front side backplate (A) to the damper housing set (B), the front side frame (C), and the side frame extension (D).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
From the passenger's compartment, weld the front side frame (A) and the front side backplate (B) to the side frame extension (C) and the dashboard lower (D).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the gusset plate (A) and the side frame gusset (B) to the front damper extension set (C).

trans.title: In case of the front side frame complete replacement

item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Front Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)

s1.ptxt: Clamp the new front side frame and the front bulkhead, and measure the front compartment diagonally.
Check the body dimensions:

ptxt.sie-ref04: Engine compartment and front floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the front subframe, and check the front side frame and the front suspension positions.
Remove the clamped parts.
Tack weld the side frame gusset to the front side backplate.
Remove the front side backplate and the side frame gusset.
Weld the side frame extension (A) to the side frame stiffener (B) (right side only) and the extension stiffener (C).
Weld the side frame gusset (A) to the front side backplate (B), install the side frame bulkhead (C) on left side, and weld the gusset plate (D).
Clamp the front side backplate (A) to the front side frame (B).
Left side: Weld the upper side frame plate (A) to the front side backplate (B), the front side frame (C), the side frame gusset (D), and the gusset plate (E).
Left side: Weld the bulkhead support (F), the front side frame, and the front side bulkhead (G).
Weld the front side backplate (A) to the damper housing set (B), the front side frame (C), and the side frame extension (D).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the gusset plate (A) and the side frame gusset (B) to the front damper extension (C).

Weld the front side frame (A), the front side backplate (B), the side frame extension (C), the extension stiffener (D), the outrigger (E), and the extension crossmeber (F) to the dashboard lower (G), the front floor panel front (H), the floor tunnel frame (I), the tunnel crossmember gusset (J), the inside sill (K), and the outer panel complete (L).
()*: Welding positions with the side sill stiffener, high-strength steel ( MPa) parts. Perform the spot welding on the conditions of No. in the table shown below.
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
